abstract: Twitter has begun showing ads to people who are not signed in to the service, a move that boosts Twitter as a promising ad platform, but not necessarily the Twitter that had has trouble attracting new users.

headline.main: Twitter Aims to Show Advertising to Much Wider Audience

snippet: Twitter has begun showing ads to people who are not signed in to the service, a move that boosts Twitter as a promising ad platform, but not necessarily the Twitter that had has trouble attracting new users.
